title: Top Floor 1 Bedroom Penthouse w/ In-unit Washer/Dryer. Prime Westwood
posting_body: Top Floor 1 Bedroom Penthouse w/ in-unit Washer/Dryer

This top floor one bedroom one bath penthouse apartment home is bright with extra-high ceilings, hardwood floor in the living room, carpeted bedroom, a private balcony, a gas fireplace, central air, and in-unit washer/dryer.
The kitchen is equipped with quartz countertops, a refrigerator, a dishwasher, a gas stove and oven.
Community features include a gym, rooftop spa, rooftop sundeck and covered parking.
Located within walking distance to everything in Westwood Village, just two blocks north of Wilshire and one block south of UCLA.
For more information, call us at
